summary: Adds armors, weapons and pets from LoL! The project just started so there are only a few armors so far but more coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][u][b]Description:[/b][/u][/color]
The mod adds armor from League of Legends to the game. There are not yet that many armors but i plan on making more!. The armors can be crafted at any forge,  are as strong as dragon plate/scale and require the same materials as dragon plate/scale to craft. 

[color=green][u][b]Current armors:[/b][/u][/color]
Ahri
Graves
Nidalee
Taric

[color=green][u][b]Current Weapons:[/b][/u][/color]
Nidalee (Greatsword - Battleaxe - Warhammer)
Taric (Mace - Warhammer - Shield)

[color=green][u][b]Current Pets:[/b][/u][/color] (Pets can be found on the little farm near the exit of whiterun)
NidaleeCougar

[color=green][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/color]
[NMM user]
Use the NMM the same way as always.

[Manual Install]
Copy Data folder to your Skyrim Directory.

[color=green][u][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/u][/color]
[NMM user]
Use the NMM the same way as always.

[Manual]
Delete the files from the data folder.
- Data/LoLArmors.esp
- Data/meshes/armor/LoL
- Data/textures/armor/LoL
- Data/meshes/actors/sabrecat/NidaleeCougar.nif

[color=green][u][b]Known Issues:[/b][/u][/color]
- The weight slider is fucked up for some reason. [color=green][u][b]-FIXED[/b][/u][/color]

[color=green][u][b]Future Plan:[/b][/u][/color]
- Add more armors!

[color=green][u][b]Change Log:[/b][/u][/color]
- v4 Adds Taric.
- v3.2 Fixes Ahri armor weight slider.
- V3.1 Forgot to upload the script in v3.
- v3 Adds Nidalee armor, spear and cougar pet.
- v2 Adds Graves armor.
- v1.2 Fixes textures.
- v1.1 Cloth version for Ahri.
- v1 Adds Ahri armor.

[color=green][u][b]Credit:[/b][/u][/color]
SenorPato
Caliente - for the CBBE body.

[color=green][u][b]My Other mods:[/b][/u][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34005/]Chicken Companion[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37010/]Fish Companion[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34232/]Killer Rabbit[/url]
author: Senor Pato
